rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Um... have you seen how
a Driver fights, mo?

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The Driver receives a weapon from
the Blade and cuts down enemies
with a flurry of slashes, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0007
rows.name:
And sometimes, they return
the weapon to the Blade...

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Then, the Blade unleashes a
powerful move and defeats the
enemy with a huge blast, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0004
rows.name: It's so cool it's breathtaking... mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But it seems the Blade gets tired
for a while after that, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0008
rows.name:
So the Driver has to keep fighting
hard, swinging their weapon, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_01_msg0006
rows.name:
That's what Etoeto's
boyfriend taught her, mo!
